title: Documentation
subtitle: Complete guide to Cardity smart protocol development
description: Welcome to the Cardity documentation. Here you'll find everything you need to develop smart protocols on the Dogecoin blockchain.

learningPath.title: Learning Path
learningPath.description: If you are a new user, we recommend learning in the following order:
steps: Install CLI tools and configure environment
Learn basic language syntax and concepts
Write and test your first contract
